text: Mohammad Afand () is an Iranian Football Midfielder who currently plays for Fajr Sepasi in Iran's Premier Football League. ==Career== Afand started his career with Bargh in 2005.http://www.iplstats.com/website05-06/playersteam10.htm He joined Fajr Sepasi in summer 2011. ===Club Career Statistics=== *Last Update: 11 May 2012 Club performance Club performance Club performance League League Cup Cup Continental Continental Total Total Season Club League Apps Goals Apps Goals Apps Goals Apps Goals Iran Iran Iran League League Hazfi Cup Hazfi Cup Asia Asia Total Total 2005–06 Bargh Pro League 1 0 – 2006–07 3 0 – 2007–08 28 1 – 2008–09 31 0 – 2009–10 Division 1 24 1 – 2010–11 22 2 – 2011–12 Fajr Sepasi Pro League 26 0 – 2012–13 0 0 0 0 – 0 0 Career total Career total Career total 135 4 0 0 ==References== ==Other websites== *Mohammad Afand at PersianLeague.com Category:People from Shiraz Category:Iranian footballers Category:Association football midfielders Category:Bargh Shiraz players Category:1984 births Category:Living people
title: Mohammad Afand
